newsitem.title: USA: Total Renal Care unveils expansion.
newsitem.headline: Total Renal Care unveils expansion.

text.p: Total Renal Care Holdings Inc on Monday announced several business deals since April 15 that significantly expanded its presence in the market for kidney dialysis and treatment.
In two acquisitions and one joint venture, the company added 11 new kidney dialysis centers, 148 new stations and over 820 patients to the company's roster.
In addition, Total Renal Care said it opened two more centers on its own, and it purchased a controlling interest in a company called Open Access Sonography.
The new dialysis facilities include five centers in Detroit and three centers in St. Paul, Minnesota. A joint venture with Priory Hospitals Group Ltd added three centers.
The company's two newly opened centers are in Los Angeles.
Lastly, Total Renal also said it boosted its ownership of Open Access to 80 percent from 20 percent.
In a statement, the company said it will continue aggressively expanding through acqusitions and development.
